text: 16.13 1 Jo 4.1-3, Lep 12.3, 12.9, 19.20, 20.10 Anɨgaknɨŋ, kɨcheki walɨjpal as tek lak omɨŋal nokom nɨgɨnek. Olap kɨpi awl meg mɨgan ak nɨb aplan jakak, olap tap ladek meg mɨgan ak nɨb aplan jakak, olap bɨne nop gos ñek binɨb okok kɨlop yepɨs yɨbɨl agñak ak16.13 Bɨ God takaw ma agɨl, yepɨs yɨbɨl agolɨgup ak, ne tap ladek kɨdek ak. Ned ne binbɨ kɨlop agak, Tap ladek ned tap nop tek gɨlak ak, nop kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Sapta 13.11-16 nɨgɨnɨm.  meg mɨgan ak nɨb aplan jakak.
